Text.Name: LingShouShitPlace
Text.ThingName: ที่อุจจาระสัตว์เลี้ยง
Text.Desc: Select a spot for your pets to defecate.

Text.Name: LSEnemyCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศัตรูที่หมดสติ
Text.Desc: สัตว์เลี้ยงสามารถนำศัตรูที่หมดสติมาวางไว้ในจุดนี้ แต่จะไม่สามารถวางซ้อนกันได้ และสัตว์เลี้ยงจะเลือกจุดวางศัตรูที่ใกล้ที่สุดเท่านั้น

Text.Name: LSWaiCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศิษย์นอกที่หมดสติ
Text.Desc: Pets can move unconscious Outer Disciples to this area by Hauling their bodies. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSNeiCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศิษย์ในที่หมดสติ
Text.Desc: Pets can move unconscious Inner Disciples to this area by Hauling their bodies. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSVistorCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางคนมาเยี่ยมที่หมดสติ
Text.Desc: Pets can move unconscious Visitors to this area by Hauling their bodies. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSIncomingCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางแขกที่หมดสติ
Text.Desc: Pets can move unconscious Guests to this area by Hauling their bodies. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSEnemyBodyCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศพศัตรู
Text.Desc: Pets can move enemy corpses to this area by Hauling them. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSWaiBodyCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศพศิษย์นอก
Text.Desc: Pets can move Outer Disciples' corpses to this area by Hauling them. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSNeiBodyCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศพศิษย์ใน
Text.Desc: Pets can move Inner Disciples' corpses to this area by Hauling them. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSVistorBodyCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศพคนมาเยี่ยม
Text.Desc: Pets can move Visitors' corpses to this area by Hauling them. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSIncomingBodyCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศพแขก
Text.Desc: Pets can move Guests' corpses to this area by Hauling them. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSMortalBodyCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางศพคนธรรมดาแปลกหน้า
Text.Desc: Pets can move mortals' corpses to this area by Hauling them. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LSMortalCarryPlace
Text.ThingName: จุดวางคนธรรมดาแปลกหน้าที่หมดสติ
Text.Desc: Pets can move unconscious mortals to this area by Hauling their bodies. Hauled bodies do not stack, and the staging area being closest to the pet would be chosen.

Text.Name: LsDogHouse
Text.ThingName: ที่นอนสัตว์เลี้ยง

Text.Name: LsDog_Carve
Text.ThingName: รูปปั้นหมาเทพ
Text.Desc: Statue of a Divine Dog. Can be used to revive or summon Divine Dog.

Text.Name: LsFox_Carve
Text.ThingName: รูปปั้นจิ้งจอกวิญญาณ
Text.Desc: Statue of a Spirit Fox. Can be used to revive or summon Spirit Fox.

Text.Name: LsDragon_Carve
Text.ThingName: รูปปั้นมังกรลอย
Text.Desc: Statue of a Float Dragon. Can be used to revive or summon Float Dragon.

Text.Name: LsPhoenix_Carve
Text.ThingName: รูปปั้นฟีนิกซ์มืด
Text.Desc: Statue of a Dark ฟินิกซ์. Can be used to revive or summon Dark ฟินิกซ์.
